feed.title: North East Margaree - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:59 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, North East Margaree
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:28 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North East Margaree 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: N 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High zero.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
